entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low zero.

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers in the evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 6 May 2023
